game.title: Save the Kingdom
game.description: The royal crown was stolen by the ruthless dragon. Your task is to infiltrate the dragon's lair to recover the crown and save the kingdom.

task.description: Speak with the villagers to learn more about the location of the dragon's lair.
With the information from the villagers, locate the dragon's lair within the Dark Forest
Use your wit and strength to defeat the dragon and retrieve the royal crown.
